articles.content: Trials are underway to see if a vaccine that partially protects against a variety of diseases can add Covid-19 to the list, but the mechanism by which it provides such broad protection has remained mysterious. Now, one team may have a piece of the answer, wit… [+3568 chars]

articles.title: New York's 'patient zero' speaks out - Balonne Beacon
articles.description: One of the first people to have been diagnosed with COVID-19 in New York State has spoken out about his first doctor’s visit with the virus.
articles.content:
The lawyer who became the coronavirus 'patient zero' in New York State's Westchester County said in a new interview that, when doctors first examined him, there was "no mention" of the deadly illness that has since infected more than 335,000 in the state.

articles.description: We should not be surprised if the virus is found in the semen since this has happened with other viruses like Ebola and Zika.
